titleStmt.title: An apologie of infants in a sermon: prouing, by the reuealed will of God, that children preuented by death of their baptisme, by Gods election, may be saued. By W.H. preacher in the Tower of London. Seene and allowed by authoritie.
titleStmt.author: Hubbock, William, b. 1560.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the widowe Orwin for Thomas Man,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon touching the vnbaptized.
Reproduction of the original in the Peterborough Cathedral. Library.
